item.title: First Shiitake Grow
item.description: First thing I learned was that I migh have started the block to soon! The color was not a deep brown as I have read is the suggested color of the brick before starting fruiting. Introduction Shiitake mushrooms, or Lentinula edodes, are a flavorful and nutritious edible mushroom from East Asia. Known for their savory taste and meaty texture, they are a popular choice in various cuisines. Nutritional Benefits: Shiitakes are low in calories but rich in B-vitamins and minerals like zinc and iron.
